name: pc-ir-relay
description: Azure Function webhook processor for Retell AI with multi-channel notifications

scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && func start
scripts.deploy: npm run build && func azure functionapp publish pc-retell-webhook
scripts.deploy-v2: npm run build && func azure functionapp publish pc-retell-webhook-v2

author: ProCircular
